## EthersGivety class

Convenience class that combines multiple interfaces of the library in one object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class EthersGivety implements ReadableEthersGivety, TransactableGivety 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableEthersGivety](./lib-ethers.readableethersgivety.md)<!-- -->, [TransactableGivety](./lib-base.transactablegivety.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `EthersGivety` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [connection](./lib-ethers.ethersgivety.connection.md) |  | [EthersGivetyConnection](./lib-ethers.ethersgivetyconnection.md) | Information about the connection to the Givety protocol. |
|  [populate](./lib-ethers.ethersgivety.populate.md) |  | [PopulatableEthersGivety](./lib-ethers.populatableethersgivety.md) | Can be used to create populated (unsigned) transactions. |
|  [send](./lib-ethers.ethersgivety.send.md) |  | [SendableEthersGivety](./lib-ethers.sendableethersgivety.md) | Can be used to send transactions without waiting for them to be mined. |
